q: served 18 months at Leavenworth, Kan. This week he's staying at a posh, oceanside hotel at Ko Olina Resort, savoring his experience with his teammates and soaking in the 80-degree weather. I'm definitely enjoying the weather. I'm about to hit the golf course right now, so we've got to cut the interviews short, he said. Things seem to be turning around for Michael Vick off the field as well.

Howard Stern calls for Hollywood to boycott Jay Leno ( video) Howard Stern ended his third and final segment on Thursday night's Late Show once again pushing for David Letterman to holler back at him off camera: "Maybe we'll get our relationship on track. I want to say this. I offered my apology and it's sincere. If you trust that I'm somewhat normal now, what we'll do is we'll start by calling each other and then maybe I'll come out to Montana and I'll stare at the wall with you and we'll see what happens." Hmm,... what would the Iron Sheik have to say about this? Follow the Howard Stern Examiner on Twitter and Facebook Want email updates on Howard Stern ? Subscribe

Barack Obama !( CNN)-- President Bush Secretary of State Colin Powell announced Sunday that he will be voting for Barack Obama , citing the Democrat's "ability to inspire" and the "inclusive nature of his campaign." I think he is a transformational figure, he is a new generation coming onto the world stage, onto the American stage, and for that reason I'll be voting for Barack Obama , Colin Powell said on NBC's "Meet the Press." according to Bloomberg. Eric Schmidt also filed to sell 5.8% of his huge 9.2 million-share stake in Google. At January 21's closing price, the transaction would be valued at$ 326.7 million.
